org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulation

Class ClassChecker.InnerClassAssignedToStaticFieldDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.objectweb.asm.MethodVisitor
      • org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulation.ClassChecker.InnerClassAssignedToStaticFieldDetector
  • Enclosing class:
    ClassChecker

    private class ClassChecker.InnerClassAssignedToStaticFieldDetector
extends org.objectweb.asm.MethodVisitor
    Class required to detect inner classes assigned to static field and thus must not be manipulated (FELIX-4347). If an inner class is assigned to a static field, it must not be manipulated.

    However notice that this is only useful when AspectJ is used, because aspectJ is changing the 'staticity' of the inner class.
